title: U.S. air conditioners shipments 2001 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of shipments in millions, containing a total of 19 data points.
In general Number of shipments in millions has rose over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2005 and 2006.
Maximum Number of shipments in millions, about 6.47 was reported at Year 2005
The lowest Number of shipments in millions, of value 3.42 was reported at Year 2010
